house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1986 has 4 bedroom(s), 3 bath(s) , 3 car garage. Rooms include dining room, family room, master bedroom. Features include private pool, private spa, patio, fireplace.
house_listing.firm_name: RE/MAX All Stars RE/MAX All Stars

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Dining Room, Family Room, Master Bedroom

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Ceiling Fan(s), Dining/LivingCombo, Dishwasher, Eat In Kitchen, Garage Door Opener, Kitchen Island,Spanish Style
